Function Documentation

const PROXY_ITEM * fx_get_proxy (  ) 

Get the proxy information.

Returns:
no NULL if have proxy info, or return NULL.
See also:
fetion_set_proxy

char * fx_get_serve_address ( void   ) 

get the current fetion id 's proxy sever ip. the ip format is ip:port(192.168.0.1:8080).

This function can use just after login success.

Returns:
the the current fetion id 's proxy sever ip, if no will return NULL.

BOOL fx_send_nudge ( long  who  ) 

send a nudge

this function should send by 10 second pre time . or it will return FALSE, and the receicer must be online.

Parameters:
who which one you want to send.
Returns:
TRUE when success, FALSE when send fail .

BOOL fx_set_proxy ( PROXY_ITEM *  item  ) 

Set the proxy when you use proxy to connnect the network.

Parameters:
item The proxy information.
Returns:
TRUE on success, FALSE on error.
See also:
fetion_get_proxy

BOOL fx_set_serve_address ( const char *  serve_address  ) 

set the fetion proxy ip and port, the proxy format is ip:port(192.168.0.1:8080).

This function should used before invoke login function

Parameters:
proxy The fetion proxy string.
Returns:
TRUE when set success, FALSE when set fail of the proxy format is wrong.

void fx_set_unknow_serve_address ( void   ) 

let the fetion get the serve_address ip and port by it self.

This function tell libfetion to get serve_address ip and port by it self. ****this function will be removed in later version****.

int fx_test_network ( PROXY_ITEM *  item,
EventListener  func,
void *  args 
)

Get the fetion network is working of proxy_item.

if item is NULL, will test direct connect to net is working.

Returns:
0 if fail immediately, or can get the result from func.
See also:
fetion_set_proxy
